description: Unique identifier for the substitution rule.
Optional scope key indicating where the substitution applies (module, device, or deployment); likely a lookup reference; confirm with SME.
Reference to the language or locale this substitution targets (foreign key to a languages table).
Original text string to be replaced in the user interface.
Text shown to users as the replacement for the original string.
Code defining the substitution category or rules; 0 appears to denote the default label rename behavior; confirm with SME.
Timestamp of the most recent change to this record.
Identifier of the user or service that last updated this record.
